name: A Gamble with Death
description:
Take your life back into your own hands and cast your die!

Lead a group of 4 unique survivors in a battle against the reaper himself. Collect resources and manage the group making the best decisions you can to survive the night. Those who can survive long enough will be granted life once again but only if they can make it to the end of Death’s game. 

As survivors die your morale will decrease, impacting your survival chances. Fight on with a streak of daring decisions however and you can build momentum, a permanent buff to your parties resource gathering and the greatest weapon you have against the manifestations of the parties phobia brought to life to attack them every night.
